alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:19PM MDT until July 06 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... South central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 319 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strasburg, or 31 miles east of Denver, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Strasburg and Byers around 330 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
